awards.description:
DESCRIPTION:THE PRIMARY OBJECTIVES OF THIS PROJECT ARE TO ESTABLISH A GAP ENVIRONMENTAL OFFICE AND HIRE AND TRAIN AN ENVIRONMENTAL COORDINATOR. THEY WILL ALSO CONDUCT LANDFILL OPERATIONS, MAINTENANCE WORK, AND ESTABLISH A COMMUNITY WASTE COLLECTION PROGRAM.ACTIVITIES:PROJECT ACTIVITIES WILL INCLUDE HIRING AN ENVIRONMENTAL COORDINATOR TO OVERSEE MANLEY'S GAP PROGRAM; PURCHASING OFFICE FURNITURE, A COMPUTER, AND SUPPLIES; ATTENDING RELEVANT CONFERENCES; DEVELOPING AN EPA-TRIBAL ENVIRONMENTAL PLAN; PARTICIPATING IN SOLID/HAZARDOUS WASTE TRAINING; ESTABLISHING AND MANAGING A COMMUNITY WASTE COLLECTION PROGRAM; CONDUCTING OPERATIONS AND MAINTENANCE WORK AT THE LANDFILL; SORTING AND STAGING MATERIALS FOR BACKHAUL; AND HIRING A CONTRACTOR TO CONDUCT BACKHAUL OF LARGER LOADS.
SUBRECIPIENT:NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.OUTCOMES:ANTICIPATED DELIVERABLES INCLUDE PROGRESS REPORTS, TRIP REPORTS, AN EPA-TRIBAL ENVIRONMENTAL PLAN, TRAINING CERTIFICATES, AND DATA ON WASTE COLLECTED: SOURCE OF WASTE, TYPE OF WASTE, AMOUNT OF WASTE, AND END DESTINATION OF WASTE. DIRECT BENEFICIARIES OF THIS GRANT ARE MEMBERS OF THE TRIBE.

PROJECT TITLE:  MANLEY VILLAGE COUNCIL TRANSPORTATION PROGRAM FUNDING FY 2024 :::: PROJECT DESCRIPTION: ALL TRANSPORTATION FUNDING PROVIDED BY FHWA TO MANLEY VILLAGE COUNCIL UNDER THE FHWA OTT PROGRAM AGREEMENT FOR FY24
